text: Gladys Davis ["Terrie"] (September 1, 1919 – October 26, 1991) was a Canadian shortstop and outfielder. She played in the All-American Girls Professional Baseball League between the 1943 and 1946 seasons with the Rockford Peaches from Rockford, Illinois. Davis batted and threw right handed. She was born in Toronto, Ontario.All-American Girls Professional Baseball League website – Gladys Davis entryThe Women of the All-American Girls Professional Baseball League: A Biographical Dictionary – W. C. Madden. Publisher: McFarland & Company, 2005. Format: Paperback, 295 pp. Language: English. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Canadian baseball players Category:Sportspeople from Toronto
title: Gladys Davis (baseball)
